hours_text:
## What's On 2026

[](https://batashoemuseum.ca/exhibitions/perugia/)

### [André Perugia](https://batashoemuseum.ca/exhibitions/perugia/)

Explore the works of one of the most significant and under-researched footwear designers of the 20th century. 

[](https://batashoemuseum.ca/rough-and-ready/)

### [Rough and Ready](https://batashoemuseum.ca/rough-and-ready/)

Explore the history of the cowboy boot in this new exhibition. Now on view.

[](https://batashoemuseum.ca/art-wear/)

### [Art Wear](https://batashoemuseum.ca/art-wear/)

“What is art?” This question has sparked debate for centuries.

[](https://batashoemuseum.ca/allaboutshoes/)

### [All About Shoes](https://batashoemuseum.ca/allaboutshoes/)

Take a walk through the the fascinating history of footwear. 

[](https://batashoemuseum.ca/event/innovations-in-black-history/)

### [Innovations in Black History](https://batashoemuseum.ca/event/innovations-in-black-history/)

An illuminating evening with social researcher Catherine Chambers as she explores Black innovations through history.

[](https://batashoemuseum.ca/event/king-tillys-shoe-disaster/)

### [King Tilly’s Shoe Disaster](https://batashoemuseum.ca/event/king-tillys-shoe-disaster/)

Step into a world of music, magic, and marvelous shoes!

[](https://batashoemuseum.ca/event/lunar-new-year/)

### [Lunar New Year](https://batashoemuseum.ca/event/lunar-new-year/)

Ring in the **Year of the Horse** with a day of vibrant performances, movement, and creativity at the...
